basics.name: Mark Moissette
basics.label: Développeur logiciel
basics.summary: Bonjour, je suis Mark, un développer with a focus on all things Javascript & 3D!
highlights: always striving for good communication & clarity : team player !
a decade of experience in web based 3D viewers & tools, parsers & serializers, optimisations
focus on reuseable software components, functional & reactive programming
passion for open source software & hardware
scientific curiosity and motivation
good ability to learn & adapt

work.summary: Développement of cnc UI & 3D viewer (Node.js , WebGL, Vue.js, Elixir)
highlights: reuseable, modular software components
backend & frontend (Elixir, Webpack etc.)
setup for e2e testing (TestCafe)
Docker container creation & deployment

work.summary: Développement of 3D viewer / modelling /rendering software (Node.js , WebGL, React, Cycle.js)
highlights: reuseable, modular software components
backend, frontend, mobile app (Browserify, Webpack etc.)
Docker container creation & deployment (server side webgl rendering etc)
Impression 3D tooling software research & prototyping

work.summary: Développement of accessibility database (Sight/Hearing/Wheelchair etc.)  & UI (Javascript, Polymer)
highlights: Maintenance and use of 3D Printers (creation of custom 3D printed designs etc)
Développement of ui & backend for custom 3D scanner software
Migration of [node-opencv](https://github.com/peterbraden/node-opencv) c++ bindings to use Nan

work.summary: Développement of bioanalysis Pipelines in Python/ R/ C++/ Linux Shell (Agile)
highlights: Développement of bioanalysis Pipelines in Python/ R/ C++/ Linux Shell (Agile)
Organisation of migration of all software to Git
Migration of Software to virtual machines / parallelization

work.position: Test Technician/ Software Developer/ Database Manager
work.summary: Développement of automation systems and UI for the generation of installations programs
highlights: Digital signatures management (nsis + php + C#)
Creation & maintenance of the internal bug-databases (Mantis/Php/MySql)

work.summary: Développement of various websites & backend data treatment
highlights: php/ mysql
js/html etc

work.summary: Développement of various websites & backend data treatment
highlights: php/ asp/ delphi

projects.name: Core maintainer/ Developer
projects.summary: Upgrade to modern Es-next, development of core features & UI of parametric 2D/3D modeling program (Javascript, Node.js)
highlights: development of core modeling & maths features, UI
creation of a desktop app (Electron)
migration from monolithic code to node modules
setup and addition of a huge amount of unit tests

projects.name: Creator/ Developer
projects.summary: Développement of core & UI of parametric 2D/3D modeling program (Javascript, Coffeescript, Node.js)

projects.name: Impression 3D
projects.summary: years of experience in working with printers: possibities, challenges, limitations, design etc
highlights: design & creation of multiple 3D printers
extensive knowledge of processes, technical and human aspects (UI, design, formats)
worked for European Leaders of Open Source 3D printers (Ultimaker)
organization of Impression 3D workshops

projects.name: 3D Design & modelling
projects.summary: Low/High poly, Wings3D, 3DSMAX, Blender, OpenSCAD, OpenJSCAD etc
highlights: designed & created 3D models for various realtime & pre-rendered projects
creation of numerous [3D-printable](https://www.thingiverse.com/ckaos/about), parametric designs

projects.name: Electronics, sensors, robotics
highlights: Use of Microcontrollers (Arduino, Eps8266, Raspberry Pi etc)
Creation of Sensors systems, mechanisms, diy multi touch displays etc
Creation of [Robots](https://github.com/PiRo-bots/kiwikee) for Kids: mix of code, 3D design & Impression 3D
Environmental monitoring & control for plants etc...

education.degree: Validated ECS in Cs, Biochemistry und Bioinformatics, *CNAM , Paris*

highlights: Scratch, Hour of Code etc
Motivation via accessible electronics: Calliope Mini & co
occasionally combining designing via code (openjscad) & Impression 3D !

volunteer.summary: Organisation of multiple Impression 3D workshops: study, assembly, operation
